mapper.insert: insert into todo(userId, noteId, content, dueDate) values(#{userId}, #{noteId}, #{content}, #{dueDate})
mapper.select: select todoId, userId, noteId, content, isDone, dueDate, createDate from todo where todoId = #{todoId}
select todoId, userId, noteId, content, isDone, dueDate, createDate from todo where userId = #{userId}
select todoId, userId, noteId, content, isDone, dueDate, createDate from todo where noteId = #{noteId}
mapper.update: update todo set content = #{content}, isDone = #{isDone}, dueDate = #{dueDate} where todoId = #{todoId}
